name: Moss Piglets
description:
In this game, players take on the role of a monster trainer, venturing into procedurally generated levels to capture and tame a variety of fantastical creatures. Each run presents new challenges and unexpected twists, as players must navigate deadly traps and fierce monsters to find and domesticate the rarest and most powerful beasts. With a deep and diverse bestiary, players can build a team of loyal companions to help them conquer the toughest challenges. Along the way, they can upgrade their equipment, learn new skills and gain powerful relics to enhance their abilities. With permadeath, players must weigh the risks and rewards of each decision, as one false step could mean the end of their journey. Will you have what it takes to become the ultimate monster trainer?

The game features a lot of different types of creatures.

Who you can fight with.

Through beautiful and cozy scenes.
